div.div: YOU'RE NOT GETTING A DIET FORK

These items are not the flashiest, or hugely expensive or outrageous or novel for the sake of it–but something that, after further inspection, could end up being the tech we’d actually buy and live every day with.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VVRM7y&via=Digg&text=A Realist's Guide To CES

div.div: Here are the top 5 danger zones for your iPhone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQ8kRA&via=Digg&text=iPhone Danger Zones

div.div: STILL LESS SCARY THAN AUTOMATIC WEAPONS

div.a: Loaded Revolutionary War-Era Cannon Found In Central Park

div.div: A dangerous and historic discovery was made in Central Park on Friday afternoon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WYXLZ8&via=Digg&text=Loaded Revolutionary War-Era Cannon Found In Central Park

div.a: Does Constant Googling Really Make You Stupid?

div.div: Preliminary data suggest that all those tweets, status updates and other digital distractions may actually stave off cognitive decline.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SoHDEH&via=Digg&text=Does Constant Googling Really Make You Stupid?

div.a: Who Killed Keith Ratliff, YouTube’s 'Gun Nut' Celeb?

div.div: The weapons enthusiast was shot surrounded by guns in Georgia, and no one knows how or by whom.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sp0cby&via=Digg&text=Who Killed Keith Ratliff, YouTube’s 'Gun Nut' Celeb?

div.a: Teens: 'Apple Is Done' And Surface Tablet Is Cool

div.div: Popularity is always a double-edged sword with teenagers and according to the sentiment observed by Buzz, Apple is now too popular to be popular.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZLEEYZ&via=Digg&text=Teens: 'Apple Is Done' And Surface Tablet Is Cool

div.div: Over the last two years, YouTube has quietly transformed from the province of amateurs to an increasingly cutthroat ecosystem where everyone — stars, networks, advertisers — is competing for views, viewers and view time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WBcjNO&via=Digg&text=YouTube Stars Fight Back

div.a: The To-Do List For Things You Want To Do, Not Need To Do

div.div: Here's how to keep track of all those books, bands, and everything else that your friends/coworkers/social media cohorts tell you about.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SonXAI&via=Digg&text=The To-Do List For Things You Want To Do, Not Need To Do

div.a: Dr. Dre Now Controls 40% Of The Headphone Market

div.div: With millions of record sales under his belt and a glittering career Dr Dre is as a hip-hop pioneer. The consumer electronics industry has come to hold him in similar esteem.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFlj4Z&via=Digg&text=Dr. Dre Now Controls 40% Of The Headphone Market

div.div: PRETEND YOU DON'T THINK IT'S THAT CUTE

div.a: Watch A Puppy Teach A Puppy How To Go Down Stairs

div.div: Watch a 6-month-old puppy teach an 8-week-old puppy how to deal with stairs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WXNWuA&via=Digg&text=Watch A Puppy Teach A Puppy How To Go Down Stairs

div.div: LOOKING AT THINGS IN NORTH KOREA

div.a: A Report On Eric Schmidt's Trip To North Korea From Someone Who Was There

div.div: The biggest surprise, however, was simply being there with Google. I wouldn’t have imagined that people from Google would go, nor would I have thought they’d be terribly welcome.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WJhKKK&via=Digg&text=A Report On Eric Schmidt's Trip To North Korea From Someone Who Was There

div.a: The No-Nonsense, Non-Alarmist, Essential Guide To The Flu

div.div: What is the flu? Has it hit your neighborhood? How worried should you be? How can you avoid getting it? What should you do if you do get sick?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V1DQv2&via=Digg&text=The No-Nonsense, Non-Alarmist, Essential Guide To The Flu

div.div: WAIT TIL YOU SEE THEIR BOWLING ALLEY

div.a: This Is Guantanamo Bay's $400,000 Go-Kart Track

div.div: Much of the public knows about the controversial military prison that is on the Guantanamo Bay Naval Base, but there is much more there than just holding cells.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VnSyxB&via=Digg&text=This Is Guantanamo Bay's $400,000 Go-Kart Track

div.a: How The U.N. Created An Epidemic And Then Covered It Up

div.div: If cholera was the inevitable result of the earthquake, centered 15 miles southwest of Haiti's capital, why had the first concentration of cases appeared in the countryside, some 45 miles to the north? And why had it taken nine months to appear?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UODmqZ&via=Digg&text=How The U.N. Created An Epidemic And Then Covered It Up

div.a: Iran Plans To Film Its Own 'Argo'

div.div: A tough week for Ben Affleck just got tougher. First, he was snubbed by the Academy. Now, news reports from Tehran say the Iranian government is planning to finance a movie that will correct what it says are numerous distortions of the historical record in “Argo.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WFI8Vy&via=Digg&text=Iran Plans To Film Its Own 'Argo'

div.div: WHEN TIME DOESN'T HEAL ALL WOUNDS

div.a: My Ex Posted 'Revenge Porn' Photos Of Me

div.div: The pictures were graphic — four stills from the video filmed almost a year prior, with my face, among other things, in full view. Next to the stills was a screenshot of my Facebook page, with my name, location, and profile picture.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WtnKHp&via=Digg&text=My Ex Posted 'Revenge Porn' Photos Of Me

div.a: The New Etiquette Of Smoking Marijuana

div.div: At a time when smoking marijuana is increasingly mainstream, legal and socially acceptable, when and where to inhale is a question flummoxing regular smokers, part-time partakers and nonsmokers alike.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VoChbR&via=Digg&text=The New Etiquette Of Smoking Marijuana

div.a: The Little-Known Legend Of Jesus In Japan

div.div: A mountain hamlet in northern Japan claims Jesus Christ was buried there.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T03xho&via=Digg&text=The Little-Known Legend Of Jesus In Japan

div.a: This Is The Best Smartphone Car Mount

div.div: After researching nearly 20 different car smartphone mounting systems that were either recommended by publications, forum posts, or user reviews, the RAM X-Grip emerged by a landslide as the best of the bunch thanks to its military-grade construction and versatility.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V2jJOm&via=Digg&text=This Is The Best Smartphone Car Mount

div.div: ONLY IF YOU'VE GOT SUPER NOSTRILS

div.a: Should You Smell Food Before Throwing It Away?

div.div: Half of the world's food is wasted, a new report says. Consumers typically use the "best-before" or "use-by" dates to decide when to throw food away. But should the "sniff test" be used instead?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13lf63N&via=Digg&text=Should You Smell Food Before Throwing It Away?

div.a: Wrap This Goop Around Your Fingers Then Smash Them With A Hammer

div.div: A super weird, rubbery non-Newtonian fluid that could be the next great material to protect your gadgets.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XT1vl5&via=Digg&text=Wrap This Goop Around Your Fingers Then Smash Them With A Hammer

div.div: An ongoing multibillion-dollar overhaul of the nation's air traffic control system is designed to make commercial aviation more efficient, more environmentally friendly and safer by 2025. But some white-hat hackers are questioning the safety part.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SoC2hs&via=Digg&text=Can Hackers Hijack Planes?

div.a: Champagne Lobby Protests The Booze At Obama’s Inauguration

div.div: The Champagne Bureau, a Washington lobby for the French Champagne industry, has a gripe with the wine listed on the menu.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VPZgvX&via=Digg&text=Champagne Lobby Protests The Booze At Obama’s Inauguration

div.div: When the for-profit prison industry places the iron fist of criminal justice in the invisible hands of the market and sells it as a cost-cutting measure, it is hard not to interpret as anything but the predatory capitalism of a self-perpetuating slave state.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sp3zj1&via=Digg&text=Privatized Prisons: A Human Marketplace

div.a: Music Created With Just A Piece Of Paper And Scissors

div.div: Musician Andrew Huang had an extra paper backdrop he was done with, but didn’t want to waste it. So he incorporated the giant piece of paper and just a pair of scissors into a musical beat of their own.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xqb9ri&via=Digg&text=Music Created With Just A Piece Of Paper And Scissors

div.div: DO YOU REALLY WANT TO KNOW?

div.a: Use This Webapp to Find Out If Your iPhone Apps Are Spying On You

div.div: Use it to find out if your apps are spying on you, storing your personal information, and sending it anywhere you might not want them to. Essential for the paranoid; interesting for the curious.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13nelaq&via=Digg&text=Use This Webapp to Find Out If Your iPhone Apps Are Spying On You

div.div: MOSTLY CONVINCES YOU NOT TO WEAR SPANDEX

div.a: This Video Of Dancing Sushi Is Supposed To Convince You To Eat More Sushi

div.div: Watch as these shining, smiling pieces of salmon, avocado and shrimp get cut down by enemy chopsticks and curl into the fetal position to await their inevitable transportation from the table to your mouth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFgJDK&via=Digg&text=This Video Of Dancing Sushi Is Supposed To Convince You To Eat More Sushi

div.a: The Most Beautiful Opera Houses In The World

div.div: Take a trip around the world in our gallery, where we’ve selected 15 of the most stunning spaces for opera aficionados and architecture/design lovers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11kZMWs&via=Digg&text=The Most Beautiful Opera Houses In The World

div.div: I’m not sure I would say LEGO blocks are that expensive, but the statement is that they are expensive because they are so well made.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WDCVh9&via=Digg&text=Why Are LEGO Sets Expensive?

div.div: How the biggest tech company in the world got that way.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SmZMTh&via=Digg&text=The Genius Of Samsung

div.div: YOU'D DIE BEFORE YOU GOT TO COFFEE

div.a: Hunter S. Thompson's Daily Routine Was Way More Intense Than Your Daily Routine

div.div: Do not try this at home.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/US1nRW&via=Digg&text=Hunter S. Thompson's Daily Routine Was Way More Intense Than Your Daily Routine

div.a: The Scientific Explanation For Why You're Stuck In The 'Friend Zone'

div.div: Because the internet isn’t done talking about the ‘friend zone,’ Vsauce decided to look into the…uh…’science’ behind it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ub00Kf&via=Digg&text=The Scientific Explanation For Why You're Stuck In The 'Friend Zone'

div.a: Was Hitler Really A Fan Of Gun Control?

div.div: Of course, attempts to equate gun control with fascism are bogus. But the "Hitler took the guns" argument has long had a prominent and fairly effective role in America's gun control debate despite its obvious reductionism.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13lFCLh&via=Digg&text=Was Hitler Really A Fan Of Gun Control?
